data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ ma:
À wo-ɠɛɛ Abalaame ʋɛtɛ dɛɛ,
Siyɔn maawɔin Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zoni,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛ ma:
Ungo, nà-telebo fai maaɓuɠaa,
À wɛlɛ maazu ʋelei geeɠɔlɔgi ʋa,
«À woilo gòoi ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɓaɠaɓaɠaiti ta ti mi eɠɛ seɠei,
Wuun, wuun!
Kɛbɛ ɗa ɠa è kpoloɗɛi vɔɔni su,
Zekana é la, zɔiti Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ti unmɔɔgai,
«Nà ʋe de, nà ɠa gè wo ɠaanɛɛnɛzu.
È yeema deɠɛmu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma, é è ɓɛtɛni,
Nágo ʋe na, kasoɠa nui ʋa ɠula kasoi ɠa.
Nɔ̀un nà, nà ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-ƓALAGI,
Gè dàawooiti pua è-la,
Wuun, wuun! Wuzeɠe, Zeluzalɛme,
Doun zunuiti pɛ è ti zɔlɔɔgai,
Maanɔɠɔ vaa zeizu felegɔ ɠa seeliai è ma:
È-loun zunuiti dɔtɔzuleʋea,
Naa ɠa é ba, woilo nii ma, maawɔin nui,
Ɗa-ƓALAGI, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è-Maliɠii wooi ɠaa,
Mazɔlɔɔ nà seizu è zili nuiti zeaʋɛ,
